name: Karim Sangeen
story: Karim Sangeen grew up in a small village near the border of Iran and Afghanistan. He joined the military at a young age and has been serving in the OPFOR for over 20 years. He was trained as a missile specialist and quickly moved up the ranks due to his dedication and skill in the field. Despite his age, Karim is still in excellent physical condition and continues to take pride in his work. He is often seen as a mentor to younger soldiers and takes his role in the military very seriously.
